void.void_info: 'This mark is a curse. It grants me acces to great power, but is it really worth losing everyone you love?'
[1] Shoot out a coin with high speed and great damage, has piercing properties and great range. [2] Applies shut-off for one turn.
[1] One, high damaged attack with a low chance of bleed, but medium chance of burning. [2] Small chance to tipper.
[1] Skips your turn. [2] When an opponent (melee) attacks you, you counterattack with high damage. Last one turn. [3] Charges your sword with electricity, granting a chance to inflict shock.

fatedVoid.fated_info: 'A blade in my hand, I charge towards the fray. With every step, I hear the enemy's dismay. My heart beats strong, my spirit unbreakable. For I am a warrior, fearless and unshakable. My sword will guide me to victory or to my grave.'
[1] Makes the entire stage dark, only making the UI visible. Lasts one turn. [2] All team members gain a small ATK boost.
[1] Ignites blade with a high voltage, giving it a medium chance to shock. [2] Ignites blade in flames, giving it a medium chance to burn. Cooldown is one turn
[1] Attacks an opponent with a high chance of bleeding. [2] Get into riposte position.

bloodVoid.bloodb_info: 'I can feel the darkness creeping in, consuming me bit by bit. Please, don't make the same mistakes as me. It's not worth it. The power may seem tempting, but it's a trap. I beg of you, turn away before it's too late.'

[1] Delivers high damaging, piercing blows of fire (2x1). Chance to inflict burn. [2] 95% chance to break Anti-True-Creature weapons. [3] Lowers opponents attack by 1% for every lost point of HP lost by this move. (min. 15%).
[1] Strikes a near opponent for heavy damage, with a high chance for bleeding. [2] Guaranteed to inflict rage on the opponent.

[1] Sets up a timer on Void, and one character on the opponent's side for 3 turns. Once that timer runs out, both characters die. Effect is negated if either target dies earlier. [2] Boosts DEF by 50%.

lilith.lilith_info: Quickly slashes an opponent for medium damage. Might inflict haunt.
Teleports behind an opponent, slashing them, you turn invisible for one turn. Unusable on your next turn after this.
Use two moves right now but skip your next turn.

reaperLilith.lilith_info: Quickly slashes an opponent for medium damage. Might inflict haunt.
Teleports behind an opponent, slashing them, you turn invisible for one turn. Unusable on your next turn after this.
Use two moves right now but skip your next turn.

kite.kite_info: 'I've been abandoned a long time ago. Now I've risen as a powerful servant of God.'
Quickly stabs one opponent, low chance for bleeding.
Gives Kite or an ally a barrier for one turn. Cooldown of one turn
Heals you or your ally for a decent amount.

angelKite.lilith_info: Quickly slashes an opponent for medium damage. Might inflict haunt.
Teleports behind an opponent, slashing them, you turn invisible for one turn. Unusable on your next turn after this.
Use two moves right now but skip your next turn.

kitt.kitt_info: 'If it ain't broke... Fix it anyway.'
Smack your opponent with a wrench. Small chance of inflicting stun.
Punch your opponent one tile back. Decent chance to inflict shock.
Builds a sentry with weak health and decent stats but can provide nice effects in battle. Lasts four turns.

engiKitt.engiKitt_info: Quickly slashes an opponent for medium damage. Might inflict haunt.
Teleports behind an opponent, slashing them, you turn invisible for one turn. Unusable on your next turn after this.
Use two moves right now but skip your next turn.

paige.paige_info: Fire a nail with your nail gun, piercing through opponents from a distance.
Sets three saw traps on the stage (1x3). It inflicts damage and bleeding on impact, and bleeding time extends whenever someone walks over them. Allies are immune to these blades.
Paige has a small selection of different parts she can throw. Each different part has different effects and damage values.

mechPaige.lilith_info: Quickly slashes an opponent for medium damage. Might inflict haunt.
Teleports behind an opponent, slashing them, you turn invisible for one turn. Unusable on your next turn after this.
Use two moves right now but skip your next turn.
